Plot: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.
Title: Concussion
Writer: Peter Landesman, Jeanne Marie Laskas (GQ article "Game Brain")
Actors: Will Smith, Alec Baldwin, Albert Brooks, Gugu Mbatha-Raw
tomatoConsensus: Concussion lands a solid, well-acted hit on its impressively timely subject matter, even if its traditional sports drama structure is a little too safe to deserve a full-on dance in the end zone.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 13 nominations.
